joinMessage:
Welcome to hackTAMS! This server will be the main source of communication and information.
First you must verify invitation. You should have received a DM from Hacker Duck. Follow his instructions to get verified. Remember to use the name and email you used to register for hackTAMS.
Not registered? No worries, can register here: https://hacktams.org/register

If you have any issues or questions regarding verification, please DM <@611762884464082945>
verifyMessage:
To verify your server invitation, please enter 
your first and last name and email used to register for hackTAMS.
Ex: `Hacker Duck hackerduck@hacktams.org`
authText:
DM Hacker Duck with your verification code to gain access to the hackTAMS server.

If this was not you, please contact dylan@hacktams.org
regNotFound:
Registration not found: Please verify you have entered the correct name and email in the following format
FirstName LastName Email
Ex: `Hacker Duck hackerduck@hacktams.org`

reminders.msg: You have exactly **24 hours left** to finish your projects. Hope your projects are going well, and feel free to talk to any team member or mentor if you have questions!
Just a courtesy reminder that you now have only **12 hours remaining** of hacking or designing. We're excited to see your amazing creations!
**2 hours remaining** until the submission deadline!! We recommend you start creating your post on Devpost now!
**1 HOUR REMAINING** until the deadline!!! You should at least have a draft on devpost by this point. We also suggest you start creating your presentation videos at this point if you haven't yet.
**TEN MIUNTES UNTIL ALL PROJECTS ARE DUE!!!!** Get your projects in NOW gogogogo!!!
